faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about SexyVoice.ai

questions.question: How does voice cloning work?
questions.answer: Our AI analyzes your voice sample (10 seconds to 5 mins) to learn its unique patterns and characteristics. With just a few seconds of clean audio, you can build a digital version of your voice that sounds natural and realistic.

questions.question: Can I clone my own voice?
questions.answer: Yes! With just a few seconds of clean audio, it can build a digital version of your voice that sounds natural and realistic.

questions.question: Is my voice data secure?
questions.answer: Absolutely. All voice recordings and generated files are encrypted and stored safely. When you clone a voice, we delete them uploaded voice sample and no one else can use it. You have full control over the generated audio files and can delete them whenever you want. We never share voice data without your consent.

questions.question: What can I use the generated voices for?
questions.answer: Creators use our voices for videos, podcasts, audiobooks, social content, games, e-learning, and more. Itâ€™s an easy way to keep consistent audio quality. Just remember our terms prohibit deception or impersonation.

questions.question: How many credits do I need?
questions.answer: About 1,000 credits make 1 minute of audio generation. New users get 10,000 free credits (about 10 minutes of speech). Our Starter plan includes 25,000 monthly credits, while Pro offers 300,000 credits for bigger projects. Choose what works for your needs.

questions.question: What languages do your AI voices support?
questions.answer:
Language support depends on the selected voice when generating speech.

Some of our AI voices (Puck, Zephyr, Gacrux, Kore, Sulafat) support 24 languages including:
Arabic (Egyptian),
English (US),
French (France),
German (Germany),
Spanish (US),
Hindi (India),
Indonesian (Indonesia),
Italian (Italy),
Japanese (Japan),
Korean (Korea),

Dutch (Netherlands),
Polish (Poland),
Thai (Thailand),
Turkish (Turkey),
Vietnamese (Vietnam),
Romanian (Romania),
Ukrainian (Ukraine),
Bengali (Bangladesh),
English/Hindi (India),
Marathi (India),
Tamil (India),
and Telugu (India).

Other voices are language-specific:

questions.question: Do you have an API for developers?
questions.answer: It's coming soon! Our API will let developers add voice generation and cloning to apps, websites, and games. You'll be able to create speech on demand and manage voice models programmatically.

questions.question: Why choose SexyVoice.ai?
questions.answer: We combine premium voice quality with simple tools and fair pricing. Whether youâ€™re a creator or a business, you get professional results without contracts or complicated setups. The free credits make it easy to try everything out.

questions.question: Is erotica or adult content generation allowed?
questions.answer: Yes, we allow adult and erotica content generation on our platform. We believe in creative freedom while maintaining responsible use. However, all content must comply with our terms of service and applicable laws. We prohibit content involving minors, non-consensual scenarios, or illegal activities.

questions.question: Can I make a voice speak with a specific accent or style, like British or pirateğŸ´â€â˜ ï¸?
questions.answer: Yes! Choose a multilingual voice (e.g., Zephyr) and type the style you wantâ€”â€œBritish accent,â€ â€œpirate voice,â€ â€œseductive tone,â€ etc. The model instantly adapts, and you can refine it with more instructions.
